mapper.insert: insert into category(category_title, create_time) values (#{categoryTitle}, NOW())
mapper.select: select c.id, c.category_title AS title, COUNT(a.id) AS total from category c left join article a ON a.category = c.category_title where a.exist = 1 GROUP BY c.id, c.category_title ORDER BY total DESC;
select id, category_title, create_time from category
